description: Ramzan Kadyrov, a key ally of President Putin, did not deny having been to hospital in Moscow.
title: Coronavirus: Chechen leader Kadyrov 'healthy' after Covid scare
title_page: Coronavirus: Chechen leader Kadyrov 'healthy' after Covid scare - BBC News
maintext: At that government meeting on Tuesday some of Mr Kadyrov's aides wore masks and none was sitting close to him. He kept his right hand hidden under the desk most of the time. They described the coronavirus situation in Chechnya as "stable".
